doc:
Ben Hall (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ben_Hall_(actor) 0 Benjamin Joseph Hall (March 18, 1899 – May 20, 1985) was an American actor who started performing as a boy and worked for three and a half decades, mainly in small parts. Benjamin_Joseph_Hall ( March_18_,_1899 – May_20_,_1985 ) was an_American_actor who started_performing as a_boy and worked for three and a_half_decades , mainly in small_parts .
